title: Simple. (Advanced Media at Arizona State University)
content:
Hello,  
 [Simple](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213318/http:/vimeo.com/9682948) is a video created by students in [Advanced Media](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213318/http:/tannerwoodford.com/syllabus/2010s), a course in the [School of Design Innovation](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213318/http:/design.asu.edu/sdi/) at [Arizona State University](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213318/http:/www.asu.edu/). For more context on this work-in-progress, [see other videos from this class](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213318/http:/typophile.com/node/68269) or [read the official project description on the course syllabus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213318/http:/tannerwoodford.com/syllabus/2010s/1.html). The video was produced by Jennifer Bianchi, Samantha Dennerline, Michael Duah, Michelle Duah, Mitch Kistner, Lauren Ledbetter and Wenhui Yu.

[http://vimeo.com/9682948](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213318/http:/vimeo.com/9682948)

<object width="600" height="450"><param name="allowfullscreen" value="true">
<param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always">
<param name="movie" value="http://vimeo.com/moogaloop.swf?clip_id=9682948&server=vimeo.com&show_title=1&show_byline=1&show_portrait=0&color=00ADEF&fullscreen=1">
<embed src="/web/20150317213318oe_/http://vimeo.com/moogaloop.swf?clip_id=9682948&server=vimeo.com&show_title=1&show_byline=1&show_portrait=0&color=00ADEF&fullscreen=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowfullscreen="true" allowscriptaccess="always" width="600" height="450"></embed></object>

[Simple.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213318/http:/vimeo.com/9682948) from [Michelle Duah](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213318/http:/vimeo.com/user2426380) on [Vimeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213318/http:/vimeo.com/).

We look forward your feedback.  
Thank you.
author: tannerwoodford

comments.content:
Hehe I love this.  
Font list drama.

I loved the command z.  
And how Albert became A.
Cute. But scold them for not hanging their punctuation.
